languages.text: "Что, мыслеед шалит? Имел возможность полюбоваться своими глазами, как он вцепился в твой спинной мозг, пока тебя штопали. Откормленная такая личинка, зубастенькая. Сейчас она подыхает — у них короткий срок жизни, — а значит, яд у нее стал особенно токсичный. Периодически ты будешь терять связь с реальностью, а когда мыслеед сдохнет окончательно — финальная доза отравы заставит тебя разувериться, что твое тело — это правда твое тело. И сердце просто перестанет биться".

"What, is your mind maggot giving you trouble? I saw it latch onto your spinal cord when you were being patched up. A fat, well-fed grub it was, with lots of teeth. It's dying now — they have a short lifespan — and that means its poison is especially toxic. You'll lose touch with reality from time to time, and when the mind maggot dies, the final dose of poison will make you think your body is not your body at all. And then your heart will just stop beating."
languages.original_text: "Что, мыслеед шалит? Имел возможность полюбоваться своими глазами, как он вцепился в твой спинной мозг, пока тебя штопали. Откормленная такая личинка, зубастенькая. Сейчас она подыхает — у них короткий срок жизни, — а значит, яд у нее стал особенно токсичный. Периодически ты будешь терять связь с реальностью, а когда мыслеед сдохнет окончательно — финальная доза отравы заставит тебя разувериться, что твое тело — это правда твое тело. И сердце просто перестанет биться".

traits.locale_text: "What, is your mind maggot giving you trouble? I saw it latch onto your spinal cord when you were being patched up. A fat, well-fed grub it was, with lots of teeth. It's dying now — they have a short lifespan — and that means its poison is especially toxic. You'll lose touch with reality from time to time, and when the mind maggot dies, the final dose of poison will make you think your body is not your body at all. And then your heart will just stop beating."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: “怎么，是你那条灵蛆惹麻烦了吗？我的人给你包扎的时候，我看到那条蛆紧紧地抓住你的脊柱，吃得肥肥胖胖的，长了很多牙。它们的寿命很短，而你身上的那条蛆很快就要死了，它的毒液也会变得极其致命。你现在会时不时与现实失去联系。等那条灵蛆死了的时候，它会注入最后一剂毒液。到时候，你会以为你的身体根本不属于你自己，然后你的心脏就不再跳动了。”
languages.original_text: "What, is your mind maggot giving you trouble? I saw it latch onto your spinal cord when you were being patched up. A fat, well-fed grub it was, with lots of teeth. It's dying now — they have a short lifespan — and that means its poison is especially toxic. You'll lose touch with reality from time to time, and when the mind maggot dies, the final dose of poison will make you think your body is not your body at all. And then your heart will just stop beating."

traits.locale_text: “怎么，是你那条灵蛆惹麻烦了吗？我的人给你包扎的时候，我看到那条蛆紧紧地抓住你的脊柱，吃得肥肥胖胖的，长了很多牙。它们的寿命很短，而你身上的那条蛆很快就要死了，它的毒液也会变得极其致命。你现在会时不时与现实失去联系。等那条灵蛆死了的时候，它会注入最后一剂毒液。到时候，你会以为你的身体根本不属于你自己，然后你的心脏就不再跳动了。”
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: «¿Qué pasa, te está dando problemas el gusano mental? He visto que se te agarraba a la médula espinal mientras te trataban. Era una larva bien rechoncha con muchos dientes. Ahora se está muriendo, son una especie efímera, y por eso mismo su veneno es especialmente tóxico. Ocasionalmente irás perdiendo el contacto con la realidad y, cuando el gusano muera, la dosis final hará que pienses que tu cuerpo no es tuyo. Y tu corazón dejará de latir».
languages.original_text: "What, is your mind maggot giving you trouble? I saw it latch onto your spinal cord when you were being patched up. A fat, well-fed grub it was, with lots of teeth. It's dying now — they have a short lifespan — and that means its poison is especially toxic. You'll lose touch with reality from time to time, and when the mind maggot dies, the final dose of poison will make you think your body is not your body at all. And then your heart will just stop beating."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué pasa, te está dando problemas el gusano mental? He visto que se te agarraba a la médula espinal mientras te trataban. Era una larva bien rechoncha con muchos dientes. Ocasionalmente irás perdiendo el contacto con la realidad y, cuando el gusano muera, la dosis final hará que pienses que tu cuerpo no es tuyo. Y tu corazón dejará de latir».
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: 「マインド・マゴットが悪さをしてるのか？手当ての間、貴様の脊髄にしがみつくのを見た。ぶくぶくと肥えた立派な身体で、歯もびっしり揃っていた。奴らは短命だから今は死にかけているはずだが、その分、猛毒を放つ。ときおり現実を見失い、マゴットが死ねと最後の力をふり絞って残りの毒を放出し、自分の身体が自分のものでないような感覚に陥るだろう。そして、やがて心臓の鼓動も止まる」
languages.original_text: "What, is your mind maggot giving you trouble? I saw it latch onto your spinal cord when you were being patched up. A fat, well-fed grub it was, with lots of teeth. It's dying now — they have a short lifespan — and that means its poison is especially toxic. You'll lose touch with reality from time to time, and when the mind maggot dies, the final dose of poison will make you think your body is not your body at all. And then your heart will just stop beating."

traits.locale_text: 「マインド・マゴットが悪さをしてるのか？手当ての間、貴様の脊髄にしがみつくのを見た。ぶくぶくと肥えた立派な身体で、歯もびっしり揃っていた。奴らは短命だから今は死にかけているはずだが、その分、猛毒を放つ。ときおり現実を見失い、マゴットが死ねと最後の力をふり絞って残りの毒を放出し、自分の身体が自分のものでないような感覚に陥るだろう。そして、やがて心臓の鼓動も止まる」
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Was, macht Euch Euer Hirnwurm etwa Schwierigkeiten? Ich habe gesehen, wie er sich an Euer Rückenmark geheftet hat, als Ihr zusammengeflickt wurdet. Eine fette, wohlgenährte Larve war es, mit unzähligen Zähnen. Der Wurm stirbt nun, sie haben nur eine kurze Lebensdauer. Und das bedeutet, dass sein Gift besonders toxisch ist. Ihr werdet gelegentlich den Bezug zur Realität verlieren, und wenn der Hirnwurm stirbt, wird die letzte Dosis Gift Euch glauben lassen, Euer Körper sei gar nicht Euer Körper. Und dann wird Euer Herz einfach aufhören zu schlagen."
languages.original_text: "What, is your mind maggot giving you trouble? I saw it latch onto your spinal cord when you were being patched up. A fat, well-fed grub it was, with lots of teeth. It's dying now — they have a short lifespan — and that means its poison is especially toxic. You'll lose touch with reality from time to time, and when the mind maggot dies, the final dose of poison will make you think your body is not your body at all. And then your heart will just stop beating."

traits.locale_text: "Was, macht Euch Euer Hirnwurm etwa Schwierigkeiten? Ich habe gesehen, wie er sich an Euer Rückenmark geheftet hat, als Ihr zusammengeflickt wurdet. Eine fette, wohlgenährte Larve war es, mit unzähligen Zähnen. Der Wurm stirbt nun, sie haben nur eine kurze Lebensdauer. Und das bedeutet, dass sein Gift besonders toxisch ist. Ihr werdet gelegentlich den Bezug zur Realität verlieren, und wenn der Hirnwurm stirbt, wird die letzte Dosis Gift Euch glauben lassen, Euer Körper sei gar nicht Euer Körper. Und dann wird Euer Herz einfach aufhören zu schlagen."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: « Quoi, votre ver cérébral fait des siennes ? Je l'ai vu s'accrocher à votre moelle épinière pendant qu'on vous soignait. Un bon gros asticot bien nourri, aux dents sacrément affûtées. Mais ces bêtes-là ne vivent pas longtemps ; il est maintenant en train de mourir en sécrétant un poison particulièrement nocif. Vous allez ponctuellement perdre le contact avec la réalité, et quand le ver mourra, la dernière dose de son poison vous donnera l'impression que votre corps ne vous appartient plus. Puis votre cœur cessera de battre. »
languages.original_text: "What, is your mind maggot giving you trouble? I saw it latch onto your spinal cord when you were being patched up. A fat, well-fed grub it was, with lots of teeth. It's dying now — they have a short lifespan — and that means its poison is especially toxic. You'll lose touch with reality from time to time, and when the mind maggot dies, the final dose of poison will make you think your body is not your body at all. And then your heart will just stop beating."

Puis votre cœur cessera de battre. »
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Ne o, zihin kurdun canını mı sıktı? Yaraların sarılırken omuriliğine yapıştığını gördüm. Şişmanca bir şeydi, belli ki iyi beslenmiş. Bir sürü de dişi vardı. Şimdi ölüyordur, neticede ömrü kısa. Zehri de bir o kadar tesirlidir. Ara sıra gerçeklikle bağın kopar. Kurt öldüğündeyse zehrin son dozu, vücudunun sana ait olmadığını düşündürecek. Sonra da kalbin duruverecek."
languages.original_text: "What, is your mind maggot giving you trouble? I saw it latch onto your spinal cord when you were being patched up. A fat, well-fed grub it was, with lots of teeth. It's dying now — they have a short lifespan — and that means its poison is especially toxic. You'll lose touch with reality from time to time, and when the mind maggot dies, the final dose of poison will make you think your body is not your body at all. And then your heart will just stop beating."

traits.locale_text: "Ne o, zihin kurdun canını mı sıktı? Yaraların sarılırken omuriliğine yapıştığını gördüm. Şişmanca bir şeydi, belli ki iyi beslenmiş. Bir sürü de dişi vardı. Şimdi ölüyordur, neticede ömürleri kısa. Zehirleri de bir o kadar tesirlidir. Ara sıra gerçeklikle bağın kopar. Kurt öldüğündeyse zehrin son dozu, vücudunun sana ait olmadığını düşündürecek. Sonra da kalbin duruverecek."
traits.speaker: Anger
